snippet: The states that continue to employ capital punishment are resorting to more desperate schemes to kill people.
abstract: Editorial calls on Supreme Court to rule definitively against the state of Florida, which has sought to defy 2002 decision prohibiting states from executing people with intellectual disabilities; notes Florida's push is only the latest desperate scheme by a handful of states as capital punishment becomes rarer and more concentrated nationwide.
lead_paragraph: The states that continue to employ capital punishment are resorting to more desperate schemes to kill people.
